newsitem.title: JAPAN: S'tomo Rubber says Goodyear tie-up within 1997.
newsitem.headline: S'tomo Rubber says Goodyear tie-up within 1997.

text.p: Japan's Sumitomo Rubber Industries Ltd said on Wednesday that it and Goodyear Tire & Rubber Co of the U.S. had agreed to produce tyres for cars using each other's brand names within this year.

Sumitomo Rubber said in a statement it will start producing Goodyear-brand tyres in Japan within this year, and Goodyear Tire will also manufacture tyres for Ohtsu Tire and Rubber Co Ltd and Dunlop Tire Corp.

Ohtsu Tire is a Sumitomo Rubber subsidiary and Dunlop Tire is an associated firm of Sumitomo Rubber in the United States. Earlier, a Sumitomo Rubber spokesman had said the companies had agreed that Sumitomo would produce Goodyear-brand tyres in Japan, but did not give details such as the timing of the tie-up.
